name: Atiba
description:
Founded in 1992, Atiba is one of the Southeast's largest managed services, web design, software development and IT consulting companies. Atiba’s other divisions include Atiba Network Services, Atiba Software, Cabedge Design and Wheelhouse Marketing.  
We are Half Geek, Half Human...transforming technical expertise into engaging solutions for your business. Our team of consultants and specialized programmers work with clients.
